Utility Functions¶

class moddb.utils.Object(**kwargs)[source]¶

A dud objects that will transform every kwarg given into an attribute

moddb.utils.concat_docs(cls)[source]¶

Does it look like I’m enjoying this?

moddb.utils.get_date(d)[source]¶

A helper function that takes a ModDB string representation of time and returns an equivalent datetime.datetime object. This can range from a datetime with the full year to second to just a year and a month.

Parameters:d (str) – String representation of a datetime
Returns:The datetime object for the given string
Return type:datetime.datetime
moddb.utils.get_tags(html)[source]¶

Helper function to return the tags found on a page

moddb.utils.get_type(img)[source]¶

Determines the type of the image through some very hacky stuff, might break

Return type:int
moddb.utils.get_views(string)[source]¶

A helper function that takes a string reresentation of total something and daily amount of that same thing and returns both as a tuple of ints.

Parameters:string (str) – The string containing the numbers both total and daily
Returns:Tuple contains the total views (first element) and the daily views (second element)
Return type:Tuple[int, int]
moddb.utils.join(path)[source]¶

Joins a partial moddb string with the base url and returns the combined url

Return type:str
moddb.utils.normalize(string)[source]¶

Removes all extra fluff from a text to get the barebone content

Return type:str
moddb.utils.polls_json_file(path)[source]¶
moddb.utils.request(url, *, params, post=False)[source]¶

Helper function to make get/post requests with the current SESSION object.

moddb.utils.soup(url, *, params={})[source]¶

A helper function that takes a url and returns a beautiful soup objects. This is used to center the request making section of the library. Can also be passed a set of paramaters, used for sorting and filtering in the search function.

Parameters:
  • url (str) – The url to get
  • params (dict) – A dictionnary of filters and sorting key-value pairs.
Returns:
Return type:

bs4.BeautifulSoup
